main.name: Hi, I'm Andrei
main.description:
Hi! My name is Andrei Hatmanu, graduated in Web
Application Development, with a great interest in learning and
improving my skills
main.bio:
Graduate in Web Development at the Jaume Balmes Institute, Barcelona. Studying, I managed to fulfill my personal interest in the IT world and, meanwhile, I developed my programming and OOP skills.

I am a cooperating person, willing to achieve personal and professional success as best as possible. I consider myself logical, strategic and determined to take part in as many challenges as possible. This is why I love working with new projects, people, personalities and technologies that I have never practiced.
The current company has offered me the opportunity to get involved in new technologies, so that I can bring as much value to the company and to the projects regardless of personal or professional qualities and abilities.

My personal intereses are in JavaScript frameworks and libraries; backend based on Javascript; web development and code optimization and progressive web application.

I am ready for new challenges!

rols.description:
Front development of a web app for the digitization of requests for connection to the gas network. Private area for clients and client travel.

TECHNOLOGIES: WordPress, React, Redux and Material-UI
TOOLS: Git, Jira, Trello, and GitLab
WORK METHODOLOGY: Agile scrum methodology

Internal project for Rockteeth. The project has been developed in React. The web application has different functional sections. First you have the CRUD of the different entities defined by the stackholder.
Secondly, we have a custom section to create prescriptions where the dentists' data are incorporated, the number of pieces (teeth) to be replaced or implanted according to the needs of each client, finally there is the client's data (name, age , face shape, etc).
Third, we have a statistics page for the monthly reports that the clinic does.
Finally, we have an incidence section, in which anomalies are discussed whether they are the client or the prescription. 

TECHNOLOGIES: React, Redux and Ant Design
TOOLS: Git, Trello, and GitLab 
WORK METHODOLOGY: Agile scrum methodolog

A copy in WordPress (Multisite) of the old web areas.com has been made using plugins such as: Custom Post Type, Advanced Custom Fields, WP Rocket and Yoast SEO.
At the request of the client, I have created a custom cookie consent popup and the carousel of the tweets of the Twitter account of each subsite. 

TECHNOLOGIES: WordPress
TOOLS: Git, Jira, Trello, and GitLab

Web application made with WordPress, for potential customers who may request gas for their home. Custom plugins have been made for the operation required by the client, at the same time, Gulp has been used as a compiler for JS and SCSS.

TECHNOLOGIES: WordPress
TOOLS: Git, Jira and GitLab
WORK METHODOLOGY: Agile scrum methodology
Check-in, boarding, checking travel requirements and documentation of passengers traveling to USA, UK and Europe at Barcelona-El Prat Airport.

Check-in and boarding of passenger to the airlines of Barcelona El Prat Terminal2.
Germanwings, Eurowings, Transavia, Jet2, Pegasus, BlueAir, Windrose, Ifly, Redwings, AirMoldova, FlyOne and WizzAir.

Repair, installation and configuration of operating systems (Windows,Linux, MAC OS), backup copies and testing of physical components (RAM,HDD, GPU, CPU, etc.). 
Desktops and laptops maintenance, basic software and system configuration for users, network configuration, DNS y Proxies, CMS configurations and maintenance, advanced use of office apps and tools, Back up, restore, maintenance and implementation of operating systems and assembly equipment.
